author: shazron
msg: Fixed bug in DeviceMotionEvent interval property, the first initial event interval should be zero

author: shazron
msg: Fixes #64 - Added W3C DeviceMotionEvent support (Accelerometer only, not Gyroscope) for devices with firmware < iOS 4.2, through duck punching

author: becka11y
msg: Was not initializing Capture<Type>Options object and was failing mobileSpec.  Had to update captureAudio implementation to accept a duration of 0 as the default value.

author: shazron
msg: Updated installer docs with rich text formatting.

author: becka11y
msg: Issue 128:  bug in DirectoryEntry.copyTo and moveTo
dding better test to see if a directory is being moved/copied into itself.
Copy /Documents/myDir to /Documents/myDir/backup should thow an INVALID_MODIFICATION_ERR
